body.raw: Contributed to the development of multiple blockchain-based platforms, including an advanced **Ethereum Token Audit Platform**, a **meme coin interactive website** with gamified airdrops, and an **AI-powered chatbot system**. Focused on building scalable, high-performance web applications using **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, and **MongoDB** in a fully remote international team.
body.html: Contributed to the development of multiple blockchain-based platforms, including an advanced Ethereum Token Audit Platform, a meme coin interactive website with gamified airdrops, and an AI-powered chatbot system. Focused on building scalable, high-performance web applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB in a fully remote international team.
